players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Only three of us left: me, Alice, Charlie. One mafia, one detective, one villager. Detective, please share your check now—this is our only day to hit mafia. If no claim, we vote by behavior. Who did you check?"

Charlie: "Hold up—before claims, let's be methodical. Bob died, so mafia killed a likely villager. Alice, if you’re detective, claim with your target and when you decided it. Diana, what’s your read on Alice vs me?"
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated Charlie last night and got a mafia result. Please vote Charlie."

Charlie: "Convenient, Alice. Anyone can claim detective and point at me. Diana, ask yourself: why would mafia kill Bob if Alice could clear him? This smells like a last-ditch fake claim. I’m village—vote Alice."

Diana: "Claim details: Alice, what exact time did you submit your check on Charlie? Charlie, if you're VT, propose a concrete plan—who do we vote and why? Also, Alice, why would mafia kill Bob over me if you’re real?"
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
